name: Mage Mania Ultimate
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2020 Entry (Theme: Out of Control)

Quick-fire, one-hit kill, local-multiplayer mage madness!

Mage Mania Ultimate is a local multiplayer game for 2 players sharing the 1 keyboard.

Player 1 plays as the Fire Mage while Player 2 plays as the Ice Mage.

Mages move slowly but their magic balls can move extremely fast.

When a player casts their magic ball, they temporarily  lose control of their Mage and control the magic ball until it hits a wall or the other player.

The magic ball itself is unwieldy leading to chaotic mage madness!

Player 1 Controls

  • Move Mage and Fireball: W, A, S , D
  • Cast Fireball: Space

Player 2 Controls

  • Move Mage and Iceball: Arrow Keys
  • Cast Iceball: Enter Key

Quit Game: Escape Key

Developed by: Thomas Pollock, Kagan Kaya and Pawel Kudel
